title: Create Incentive for New/More App Developers
body: I currently develop for Android and iOS. I am interested in developing for Windows Phone, but would need a device, to pay registration and learn a 3rd platform to do so. That involves a lot of time, which is a large risk to smaller development companies.

comments.body: Take a look at Tech Rewards https://rewards.msdn.microsoft.com
At the beginning I'd like just to be free to debug my apps on my phone and pay for marketplace when ready
Thanks for the tip, Mat. I'll check that out.

Believe it or not, you can usually get a free account if you get in touch with the right people - Microsoft calls them "developer evangelists" and they have free reign to give out codes for a year of App Hub membership - although they can only *lend* you free devices. You could always chuck a tweet at https://twitter.com/#!/wpdev asking who your local evangelist is.
